meanings.definition: To strike or beat with a cudgel.
meanings.sent1: The angry man was becudgelling the door with his stick.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith was becudgelling the hot iron to shape it.
meanings.sent3: The toddler pretended to becudgell the pillow with his toy hammer.
meanings.sent4: The storm was becudgelling the trees with strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The drummer becudgelled the drum to create a loud sound.

meanings.sent1: The teacher was becudgelling the student for not completing the homework.
meanings.sent2: The boss becudgelled the employee for coming late to work.
meanings.sent3: The comedian becudgelled himself for forgetting the punchline.
meanings.sent4: The judge becudgelled the defendant with a harsh sentence.
meanings.sent5: The coach becudgelled the team for their poor performance.
